text:
Thank you for an awesome work done on the framing of 4 chinese calligraphy for our office

Greatly appreciated 👍🏼😊🙏🏻

I have ordered from SGFrames multiple times, and each experience has been nothing short of excellent! Their service is incredibly professional and friendly, ensuring a smooth and hassle-free process every time. The quality of their products is outstanding, exceeding my expectations with every order.

Without a doubt, I will continue to return to SGFrames for their top-notch craftsmanship and impeccable customer service. Highly recommended!

Just collected 2 paintings framed here. Professional service and advice provided and they spray painted my frame to a beautiful colour that we agreed on. Many frames to choose from and very reasonable pricing. Definitely a place to frame everything, even jerseys. Five stars rating for sure.
Very happy with the SGFRAMES shop. The team is very nice and they followed all the demanding request. As a picky person, I recommend 100%
2nd time here & the staff recognised me instantly. Friendly service & staff also provided tips on framing. Reasonably priced & will definitely return. 😊
